title: Fighter Jet Landing Gear Predictive Maintenance
description: Sensors on a fighter jet's landing gear indicate abnormal stress during recent landings, predicting a potential failure.

tasks.description: Receive and analyze the stress gauge data from the aircraft's maintenance logs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Maintenance officer confirms the data shows stress levels exceeding safety thresholds.

tasks.description: Ground the aircraft and schedule it for a detailed, non-destructive inspection of the landing gear assembly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer takes proactive steps to prevent a landing gear collapse.

tasks.description: Based on the inspection, create a work order to replace the specific high-stress components.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer ensures the correct repair is performed to return the jet to service safely.
